title: Did New Zealand's Prime Minister, Sinda Arden, without a veil, provide assistance to the families of the victims of the massacres?
subtitle: In the wake of a massacre in mosques committed by a suspected white fanatic, New Zealand was shaken by grief.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Prime Minister of New Zealand, Sinda Arden, wore a veil and offered financial assistance to support the victims of the Christchurch shooting.
